thread.section_title: Randy Fox Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Randy Fox | randyfox.com.au
thread.title: Johanna S
thread.title_full: Randy Fox reviewed by Johanna S

author: Johanna S
title: Johanna S
text:
Ordered two small vibrators, one arrived broken so i sent it back and could choose between a new one, gift card or money back. Since it was out of stock I could choose something of similar value. My two new products exceeded the price of the vibrator and I offered to pay the rest of the amount but Randy Fox ensured me they would pay for it all including shipping.
Good products, prices and excellent, quick and problem solving customer service!
